------=_NextPart_000_012B_01C11173.CAC98440
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

OOC: You tell 'em Yan, we don't need that OOC $#!^ anymore.  I'm an Abyssia=
n Badass, so don't **** with me!  Oh, and everybody, I've finally came to t=
he conclusion that I really am a good RPer.  Still not good enough for coun=
cil =3D)=3D(  but who cares?  See, if it weren't for me realising how much =
NBWRPG means to me and how big a part of my life it has been, is, and will =
be, I'd still be calling myself nothing.  But anyway, get used to the new: =
Abyssian Badass!  Yeah!  

BIC:   Necromancer smiled as he realised how muc=
h he loved being a Maximal.

        "Sister, why don't we get in touch wit=
h our old Maximal friends again, like Firearm and Prowl?" Necromancer sugge=
sted.

        "I wouldn't call them friends, but at least it's something t=
o do," Hell Drak said.

        For once, Necromancer didn't sigh at Hell D=
rak's snobby behavior.  He just shrugged.  Necromancer and Hell Drak went o=
ff to Prowl and Orion's position.  They got there in a few minutes(sorry if=
 they are like a billion miles away, if they were, then scratch this rest).=
  

         "Prowl!  Orion!  Good to see you guys again!" Necromancer gree=
ted heartily. 

         Hell Drak was silent.



~Abyssian By Birth~
~Bada=
ss By Choice~
